mainfeatures: 2.7" TFT LCD color screen gives you and your families a wonderful life 4X zoom digital camera, easy to control and capture life's most captivating moments LCD digital video camera uses li-ion battery The video camcorder comes with standard TV & High Definition TV output
specifications: Image Sensor: 3.1MP CMOS (Max interpolation 8MP) Image Resolution: 8M; 5M; 3M; 2M; 1M Video Recording: 720P(1280X720)/30fps; 720x480; VGA(640X480); QVGA(320X240) Lens: F3.0; f=6.5mm Focus Range: Normal Mode: 150cm~Infinity Optical Zoom: NO Digital Zoom: 4X Display Screen: 2.7 Inches LCD Rotate LCD: 90 degree rotation Shutter: 1/20~1/6000s  /Electronic Secondary Light Source: LED:Yes Exposure Control: -2.0EV~+2.0EV White Balance: AUTO; Daylight; Cloudy; Tungsten Lamp; Fluorescent Lamp ISO: AUTO Scene Modes: AUTO Shooting Mode: Self-timer:2s/10s Continuous Shooting: Three times continuous shooting Camera Pause: NO Built-in Memory: NO Extended Memory: Support SD/SDHC card (up to 32GB) Remote Control: NO Anti-shake: NO Face Detection: NO AV-OUT: NTSC/PAL Auto Power Off: 1min/3mins/5mins/OFF File Formats: AVI, JPEG, WAV OSD language: English, Simplified Chinese Transmission Interface: USB, AV-out Power source: Lithium battery(3.7V 900mAh) Product Size: 118 x 55 x 60mm
packagecontents: 1 x Camera 1 x User Manual 1 x CD-ROM Drive 1 x Camera Bag 1 x Charger 1 x Lithium battery 1 x AV Cable 1 x USB Cable
whitebalance: AUTO; Daylight; Cloudy; Tungsten Lamp; Fluorescent Lamp
